author: See Store Details SET AS PREFERRED STORE
description: Functional medicine is the future of health care in the US. Functional medicine aims to correct the patient's issues using root cause treatments rather than just treating symptoms. Learn how to integrate functional medicine testing and treatments into your day to day life in a cost effective manner. Topics covered include weight loss, digestive issues, headaches, poor sleep, thyroid imbalances, and much more.
cleaned_text: Functional Medicine on a Budget Cost Effective Ways to Integrate Functional Medicine Into Your Day to Day Life. Details: Functional medicine is the future of health care in the US. Functional medicine aims to correct the patient's issues using root cause treatments rather than just treating symptoms. Learn how to integrate functional medicine testing and treatments into your day to day life in a cost effective manner. Topics covered include weight loss, digestive issues, headaches, poor sleep, thyroid imbalances, and much more. Presented By: Dr. Riley Kulm Location: Aurora - South 3440 S Tower Rd Aurora, CO 80013 United States
